column5: Hey all  Im looking for a SD card for my Handhelp gps. I have a magellan meridian gold. I bought it used with no manual so I dont know what works with it ??? Im new to the GPS thing so  Im looking for maps of rondeau bay... lake st.clair... basicly southwestern ontario !  Looking for something fairly reasonable in price, or used even ???  What should I be looking for ?
Navionics Gold Map number 14 or CODE: 14XG-2 should be what you want...
I thought that only topo and street maps work with that one, but who knows
